name: UPHELD
description: UPHELD (UPwork Human Evaluated Longer Dialogues) Dataset: a comprehensive, publicly available dataset featuring human-annotated long-form dialogues

recordSet.name: annotations
recordSet.description: Records extracted from the example table, with their schema.

fields.name: chat_history
fields.description: A string containing the full dialogue between the user and the assistant, with turns separated by newlines.

fields.name: Option A
fields.description: A string containing the full dialogue between the user and the assistant, with turns separated by newlines.

fields.name: Option B
fields.description: A string representing the model output as a continuation to the conversation in chat_history column.

fields.name: score_task_1_content
fields.description: A numerical rating indicating the level of content overlap between Option A and Option B.

fields.name: score_task_2_style
fields.description: A numerical rating indicating the level of style overlap between Option A and Option B.

fields.name: score_task_3_reasonableness
fields.description: A numerical rating indicating how reasonable Option B is as a continuation of the dialogue in chat_history column.

fields.name: model
fields.description: The name of the language model that generated Option B response.

fields.name: id_annotated
fields.description: The id of the annotated data point.
